Detailed Description

Class provides groups of permits dependent visualisation.

$  MasterType,
$  GroupList,
$  Class

Function compiles control.

$MasterId - Master object's id.
$MasterType - Master object's type.

$Class - CSS class of the control.

Records.
Exceptions:
Exception An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 102 of file group_view.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $MasterId = $this->Security->get( $MasterId , 'integer' );
                        $MasterType = $this->Security->get( $MasterType , 'command' );
                        $GroupList = $this->Security->get( $GroupList , 'command' );
                        
                        $ObjectGroupList = $this->GroupAccess->get_groups_for_object( $MasterId , $MasterType );
                        $GroupName = $this->Security->get_gp( 'group_name' , 'command' , false );
                        $Code = '';
                        
                        foreach( $GroupList as $i => $GroupTitle )
                        {
                              $Selected = ( $GroupName === false )
                                    ? ( in_array( $GroupTitle , $ObjectGroupList ) ? ' selected' : '' )
                                    : ( $GroupName == $GroupTitle ? ' selected' : '' );

                              $Code .= "<option value=\"$GroupTitle\"$Selected>{lang:$GroupTitle}";
                        }
                        return( 
                              "<input type=\"hidden\" name=\"group_list\" value=\"".implode( ',' , $GroupList ).
                              "\"><select class=\"$Class\" name=\"group_name\">$Code</select>"
                        );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

$  Changed 
)

Function processes macro 'group_select'.

Parameters:
$ProcessingString - Processing string.

array( $ProcessingString , $Changed ).

Exception An exception of this type is thrown.

Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 159 of file group_view.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        for( ; $MacroParameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $ProcessingString , 'group_select' ) ; )
                        {
                              $this->BlockParameters->load_settings( $MacroParameters );
                              
                              $MasterId = $this->BlockParameters->get_setting( 'master_id' );
                              $MasterType = $this->BlockParameters->get_setting( 'master_type' );
                              $GroupList = explode( ',' , $this->BlockParameters->get_setting( 'group_list' ) );
                              $Class = $this->BlockParameters->get_setting( 'class' , 'flat' );
                              
                              $Code = $this->compile_group_select( $MasterId , $MasterType , $GroupList , $Class );
                              
                              $ProcessingString = str_replace( "{group_select:$MacroParameters}" , $Code , $ProcessingString );
                              
                              $Changed = true;
                        }

                        return( array( $ProcessingString , $Changed ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }
